name: Translation Services
description: The staff is multilingual, speaking English, Spanish, Mandarin, and Cantonese. We also offer telephonic language interpretation services in 20 languages for those who visit the office and need assistance. Our 24-hour automated telephone information line (Info-to-Go) is available in Spanish and Chinese. Please note, that our staff doesn't provide translation services at hearings or mediations. However, if you can't afford an interpreter, you can fill out a Hardship Application form to have one pr

howToGetIt: Phone counseling available at (415) 252-4631 during regular hours 9:00 AM to 12:00 PM and 1:00 PM to 4:00 PM. Calls are generally limited to 5 minutes. Counselor in-person at Rent Board's office available Monday through Friday, 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM. Meetings are generally limited to 10 minutes. Due to limited staffing, no inquiries by email.
address: 25 Van Ness Ave, Suite # 700, San Francisco, CA, 94102
